Module Frogger
Package p4_group_8_repo.Controllers

Class AnimalController

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.Controllers.AnimalController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActorControllers
public class AnimalController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActorControllers
A controller class for the Animal model following the MVC pattern.
It contains all the methods responsible for the actions of an Animal object such as its intersection with other objects and its death.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    AnimalMovement object to control the movement of the Actor

    variable to indicate the number of deaths

    number of end goals the user reaches with the Actor object

    A string to hold the file path of the image source.

    image size
    private double movementY
    movement of the Actor object along the Y axis

    to indicate if the Actor object should be moving or not

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimalController

      public AnimalController​(Actor animal)

  • Method Details

    • getActor

      public Actor getActor()
      Returns:
      Actor object

    • mainControl

      public void mainControl​(long now)
      The main control of the controller is written in this method.
      Main controls for this class are how the animal should act when it intersects with other objects, when it dies and when keys are pressed or released.
      Specified by:
      mainControl in interface ActorControllers
      Parameters:
      now - the current timestamp of the frame in nanoseconds

    • atIntersection

      private void atIntersection()
      This method includes all events that should occur when the Actor object intersects with other objects such as End or Obstacle objects.

    • death

      private void death​(long now)
      Sets the image of the Actor object and reduces points when the Actor dies after intersecting with an Obstacle object or by drowning.
      Parameters:
      now - timestamp of the current frame in nanoseconds

    • resetAfterDeath

      private void resetAfterDeath()
      Resets the Actor object back to its start position and image if it dies.

    • hasGameEnded

      public boolean hasGameEnded()
      Returns whether the user has finished the game or not. The game stops when the number of end goals is 5.
      Specified by:
      hasGameEnded in interface ActorControllers
      Returns:
      boolean value of end==5

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the points the user has accumulated in the game.
      Specified by:
      getPoints in interface ActorControllers
      Returns:
      points earned in the game

    • changeScore

      public boolean changeScore()
      This method returns whether the score of the user has changed or not.
      Specified by:
      changeScore in interface ActorControllers
      Returns:
      true if score changed, false otherwise

    • getCarDeath

      public boolean getCarDeath()
      Gets the carDeath variable. Indicates whether the Actor object has died a death of type carDeath.
      Returns:
      current state of the carDeath variable (true/false)

    • getWaterDeath

      public boolean getWaterDeath()
      Gets the waterDeath variable. Indicates whether the Actor object has died a death of type waterDeath.
      Returns:
      current state of the waterDeath variable (true/false)
